column4: Hi everyone. Can anyone point me a place in the web where I can find the full specification for a debian package appear correctly in the new ubuntu software center?
the normal specifications can be found in the debhelper-documentation. there are also additional fields which are (imo) ubuntu-specific like "support" and "images"
own rules because they are ubuntu-specific
but they should be found in the debhelper-manpage from ubuntu
imo debian is not using images yet, maybe have also a look at #ubuntu-devel and #debian (to see the current state)
